channel.title: [PI] Other value then coins shop[PI]
channel.description:
Ok I added a shop that you can buy items with Shantay passes. but when i wanna buysomething I need to have coins in my inventory. It doesn't use coins but It gotta have coins in inventory , how i fix this?
video ; http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3UqTEXaV4eA

item.title: [PI] Other value then coins shop[PI]
item.dc:creator: @nicke924 nicke924
item.description:
@nicke924 wrote:

                if (c.myShopId == 85) {
                        c.sendMessage(c.getItems().getItemName(removeId)+": currently costs " + getSpecialItemValue(removeId) + " Vote Tickets.");
                        return;
                }
and 

                        int Slot4 = 0;//Vote Tickets

and

                                if(Slot4 == -1 && c.myShopId == 85) {
                                        c.sendMessage("You don't have enough vote tickets.");
                                        break;
                                }


and 

                        if (c.playerItemsN[Slot4] >= TotPrice2) {
                 				if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 0) {
							buyDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
							c.getItems().deleteItem(1854, c.getItems().getItemSlot(1854), TotPrice2);
							c.getItems().addItem(itemID, 1);
							Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[c.myShopId][fromSlot] -= 1;
							Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[c.myShopId][fromSlot] = 0;
							if ((fromSlot + 1) > Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[c.myShopId]) {
								Server.shopHandler.ShopItems[c.myShopId][fromSlot] = 0;
							}
						} else {
							c.sendMessage("You don't have enough space in your inventory.");
							break;
						}
					} else {
						c.sendMessage("You don't have enough Vote Tickets.");
						break;
					}
                }

Read full topic
